page.title: 24Calne Duck Race
page.content:
Every year Calne does a race with ducks. Every school enters and some win prizes for coming first, second or third. It is still looked upon as an exciting and unique fate. It raises money for community charities every year. For schools first prize is £50, second £25 and third £10. ‘It is an exquisite event every year’ Billey Chi yr 6.



Every year each school decorates their duck with creative colours, dazzling designs, magnificent mottos and exciting emblems. It started at 17th May 2008 at 10:00.If you buy a duck separately first prize is.......£200.Second prize.......£100.Leaving third place with........£50!!!


Contribution by: Billey Chi
